Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Goggles
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Gloves
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Goggles, visors, lenses etc.

You are able to wear glasses and goggles to enhance your vision and other skills. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Acolyte's Lenses
  • Intelligence +8 Intelligence +8: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
  • Insightful Intelligence +3Insightful Intelligence +3: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +3 insight bonus to Intelligence.
  • Insightful Wizardry +77Insightful Wizardry +77: +77 Insight bonus to spell points.
  • Spellcraft +16Spellcraft +16: Passive: +16 Competence bonus to the Spellcraft skill.

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus or Protection (Deflection bonus): +1 to +8

    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +8

Alpha Phase Goggles
  • Visibility 1: Allows you to see whats otherwise invisible the phase tile puzzles opposite side. Also allows you to see and attack death-hex phase wraiths when the Black Abbot summons them. Be warned however: You will not be able to see much anything else except the phase wraiths if you wear these goggles on the main platform.
  • Drops on leaving adventure, Drops on death: Temporary raid-only item.
 None Unbound, Drops on death, Drops on leaving adventureUnbound: This item is Unbound, and may take permanent damage.
This item drops on death or on leaving adventure 		Ascension Chamber Phase Tile Puzzle

Drow Smoke Goggles
  • Spot -5Spot -5: Passive: -5 Competence bonus to the Spot skill.
  • Blindness ImmunityBlindness Immunity: Grants its wearer immunity to blindness effects.
  • ManslayerManslayer: While wearing this item, your weapon attacks gain the devastating ability to defeat a humanoid opponent with a single decisive blow. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit a humanoid target will be killed. Powerful humanoids may resist the vorpal strike and instead take 100 points of damage until they have been sufficiently weakened.
  • Seeker 6 Seeker 6: Provides a +6 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +6 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
